profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Robert Frost at Hill Auditorium [video recording]

descgrp.userestrict: Duplication prohibited except with permission of the Frost estate.

archdesc.scopecontent: Robert Frost reads poems and discusses his poetry.
